Gatekeeper Tamil: Do you know Oren's Ivory Tower? I am one of the few Orcs to be inducted into the Gatekeeper Guild? Ah, you don't know of what I speak? How can you be ignorant about the center of magic, where the most brilliant wizards of our age gather? Ah, I finally see the dawning of respect in your eyes. Now, are you ready to experience the power of our magic?
